definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

sentences.chinese: 攝影是門破鈔很多的喜歡。

sentences.english: You can go sightseeing without paying any money by yourself!
sentences.chinese: 你不消破鈔本身一個子兒便可以旅遊不雅光。

sentences.english: Do not waste your time on a man who is not willing to waste their time on you .
sentences.chinese: 不要爲那些不願在你身上破鈔的人而你的時間。

sentences.english: Improve living quality, and release the economic burden of family.
sentences.chinese: 生活生計水平提高，增添家庭破鈔。
攝影是門破鈔很多的喜好。
